alert.note: Alert for North Beltrami; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Beltrami County through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Funkley, or 27 miles northeast of Bemidji, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blackduck, Kelliher, Funkley and Shooks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
